trans-unit.source: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution template PowerBI Dashboard setup instructions | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution template PowerBI Dashboard setup instructions | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
trans-unit.target: Use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.

trans-unit.source: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution template PowerBI Dashboard setup instructions
trans-unit.target: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution template PowerBI Dashboard setup instructions

trans-unit.source: This **menu** links to the chapters in this playbook.
trans-unit.target: This **menu** links to the chapters in this playbook.

trans-unit.source: The Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution showcases how car dealerships, automobile manufacturers and insurance companies can leverage the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits to drive improvements in the area of customer experience, R&D and marketing campaigns.
trans-unit.target: The Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution showcases how car dealerships, automobile manufacturers and insurance companies can leverage the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits to drive improvements in the area of customer experience, R&D and marketing campaigns.

trans-unit.source: This document contains step by step instructions on how you can configure the PowerBI reports and dashboard once the solution is deployed in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: This document contains step by step instructions on how you can configure the PowerBI reports and dashboard once the solution is deployed in your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Deploy the Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution by navigating to [https://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/SolutionTemplate/Vehicle-Telemetry-Analytics-3](https://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/SolutionTemplate/Vehicle-Telemetry-Analytics-3)
trans-unit.target: Deploy the Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution by navigating to [https://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/SolutionTemplate/Vehicle-Telemetry-Analytics-3](https://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/SolutionTemplate/Vehicle-Telemetry-Analytics-3)

trans-unit.source: [Install Microsoft Power BI Desktop](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=45331)
trans-unit.target: [Install Microsoft Power BI Desktop](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=45331)

trans-unit.source: An [Azure subscription](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: An [Azure subscription](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure subscription, get started with Azure free subscription
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure subscription, get started with Azure free subscription

trans-unit.source: Microsoft PowerBI account
trans-unit.target: Microsoft PowerBI account

trans-unit.source: Cortana Analytics Suite Components
trans-unit.target: Cortana Analytics Suite Components

trans-unit.source: As part of the Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution template, the following Cortana Analytics services are deployed in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: As part of the Vehicle Telemetry Analytics solution template, the following Cortana Analytics services are deployed in your subscription.

trans-unit.source: **Event Hubs** for ingesting millions of vehicle telemetry events into Azure.
trans-unit.target: **Event Hubs** for ingesting millions of vehicle telemetry events into Azure.

trans-unit.source: **Stream Analytic**s for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.
trans-unit.target: **Stream Analytic**s for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.

trans-unit.source: **Machine Learning** for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.
trans-unit.target: **Machine Learning** for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.

trans-unit.source: **HDInsight** is leveraged to transform data at scale
trans-unit.target: **HDInsight** is leveraged to transform data at scale

trans-unit.source: **Data Factory** handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.
trans-unit.target: **Data Factory** handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.

trans-unit.source: **Power BI** gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.
trans-unit.target: **Power BI** gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.

trans-unit.source: The solution uses two different data sources: **Simulated vehicle signals and diagnostic dataset** and **vehicle catalog**.
trans-unit.target: The solution uses two different data sources: **Simulated vehicle signals and diagnostic dataset** and **vehicle catalog**.

trans-unit.source: A vehicle telematics simulator is included as part of this solution.
trans-unit.target: A vehicle telematics simulator is included as part of this solution.

trans-unit.source: It emits diagnostic information and signals corresponding to the state of the vehicle and driving pattern at a given point in time.
trans-unit.target: It emits diagnostic information and signals corresponding to the state of the vehicle and driving pattern at a given point in time.

trans-unit.source: The Vehicle Catalog is a reference dataset containing VIN to model mapping
trans-unit.target: The Vehicle Catalog is a reference dataset containing VIN to model mapping

trans-unit.source: PowerBI Dashboard Preparation
trans-unit.target: PowerBI Dashboard Preparation

trans-unit.source: Deployment
trans-unit.target: Deployment

trans-unit.source: Once the deployment is completed, you should see the below diagram with all of these components marked in GREEN.
trans-unit.target: Once the deployment is completed, you should see the below diagram with all of these components marked in GREEN.

trans-unit.source: Click on the arrow on the upper right of the green nodes to navigate to the corresponding services to validate whether all of these have deployed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Click on the arrow on the upper right of the green nodes to navigate to the corresponding services to validate whether all of these have deployed successfully.

trans-unit.source: Click on the arrow on the upper right on the Vehicle Telematics Simulator node to download the data simulator package.
trans-unit.target: Click on the arrow on the upper right on the Vehicle Telematics Simulator node to download the data simulator package.

trans-unit.source: Save and extract the files locally on your machine.
trans-unit.target: Save and extract the files locally on your machine.

trans-unit.source: Now, you are ready to configure the PowerBI dashboard with rich visualizations to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
trans-unit.target: Now, you are ready to configure the PowerBI dashboard with rich visualizations to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.

trans-unit.source: It takes about 45 minutes to an hour to create all the reports and configure the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: It takes about 45 minutes to an hour to create all the reports and configure the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Setup Power BI Real-Time Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Setup Power BI Real-Time Dashboard

trans-unit.source: **Generate simulated data**
trans-unit.target: **Generate simulated data**

trans-unit.source: On your local machine, go to the folder where you extracted the Vehicle Telematics Simulator package ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/2-vehicle-telematics-simulator-folder.png)
trans-unit.target: On your local machine, go to the folder where you extracted the Vehicle Telematics Simulator package ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/2-vehicle-telematics-simulator-folder.png)

trans-unit.source: Execute the application ***CarEventGenerator.exe***.
trans-unit.target: Execute the application ***CarEventGenerator.exe***.

trans-unit.source: It emits diagnostic information and signals corresponding to the state of the vehicle and driving pattern at a given point in time.
trans-unit.target: It emits diagnostic information and signals corresponding to the state of the vehicle and driving pattern at a given point in time.

trans-unit.source: This is published to an Azure Event Hub instance that is configured as part of your deployment.
trans-unit.target: This is published to an Azure Event Hub instance that is configured as part of your deployment.

trans-unit.source: **Start the real-time dashboard application**
trans-unit.target: **Start the real-time dashboard application**

trans-unit.source: An application is included as part of the solution to generate the real-time dashboard in PowerBI.
trans-unit.target: An application is included as part of the solution to generate the real-time dashboard in PowerBI.

trans-unit.source: This application is listening to an Event Hub instance where Stream Analytics is publishing the events in a continuously pattern.
trans-unit.target: This application is listening to an Event Hub instance where Stream Analytics is publishing the events in a continuously pattern.

trans-unit.source: For every event that this application received, it processes the data using Machine Learning Request-Response scoring endpoint and the resultant dataset is published to the PowerBI push API’s for visualization.
trans-unit.target: For every event that this application received, it processes the data using Machine Learning Request-Response scoring endpoint and the resultant dataset is published to the PowerBI push API’s for visualization.

trans-unit.source: To download the application:
trans-unit.target: To download the application:

trans-unit.source: Click on the PowerBI node on the diagram view and click the **Download Real-time Dashboard Application**’ link on the properties pane.![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard-new1.png)
trans-unit.target: Click on the PowerBI node on the diagram view and click the **Download Real-time Dashboard Application**’ link on the properties pane.![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard-new1.png)

trans-unit.source: Extract and save the application locally ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/4-real-time-dashboard-application.png)
trans-unit.target: Extract and save the application locally ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/4-real-time-dashboard-application.png)

trans-unit.source: Execute the application **RealtimeDashboardApp.exe**
trans-unit.target: Execute the application **RealtimeDashboardApp.exe**

trans-unit.source: Provide valid Power BI credentials, sign in and click **Accept**
trans-unit.target: Provide valid Power BI credentials, sign in and click **Accept**

trans-unit.source: Configure PowerBI reports
trans-unit.target: Configure PowerBI reports

trans-unit.source: The real-time reports and the dashboard takes about 30-45 minutes to complete.
trans-unit.target: The real-time reports and the dashboard takes about 30-45 minutes to complete.

trans-unit.source: Browse to [http://powerbi.com](http://powerbi.com) and login.
trans-unit.target: Browse to [http://powerbi.com](http://powerbi.com) and login.

trans-unit.source: A new dataset will be generated in Power BI.
trans-unit.target: A new dataset will be generated in Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **ConnectedCarsRealtime** dataset.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **ConnectedCarsRealtime** dataset.

trans-unit.source: Save the blank report using **Ctrl + s**.
trans-unit.target: Save the blank report using **Ctrl + s**.

trans-unit.source: Provide report name *Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Real time - Reports*.
trans-unit.target: Provide report name *Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Real time - Reports*.

trans-unit.source: Real-time reports
trans-unit.target: Real-time reports

trans-unit.source: There are 3 real-time reports in this solution:
trans-unit.target: There are 3 real-time reports in this solution:

trans-unit.source: Vehicles in operation
trans-unit.target: Vehicles in operation

trans-unit.source: Vehicles Requiring Maintenance
trans-unit.target: Vehicles Requiring Maintenance

trans-unit.source: Vehicles Health Statistics
trans-unit.target: Vehicles Health Statistics

trans-unit.source: You can choose to configure all the 3 real-time reports or stop after any stage and proceed to the next section of configuring the batch reports.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to configure all the 3 real-time reports or stop after any stage and proceed to the next section of configuring the batch reports.

trans-unit.source: We recommend you to create all the 3 reports to visualize the full insights of the real-time path of the solution.
trans-unit.target: We recommend you to create all the 3 reports to visualize the full insights of the real-time path of the solution.

trans-unit.source: 1. Vehicles in operation
trans-unit.target: 1. Vehicles in operation

trans-unit.source: Double-click on **Page 1** and rename it to “Vehicles in operation” ![Connected Cars - Vehicles in operation](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4a.png)
trans-unit.target: Double-click on **Page 1** and rename it to “Vehicles in operation” ![Connected Cars - Vehicles in operation](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4a.png)

trans-unit.source: Select **vin** field from **Fields** and choose visualization type as **“Card”**.
trans-unit.target: Select **vin** field from **Fields** and choose visualization type as **“Card”**.

trans-unit.source: Card visualization will be created as shown in figure.
trans-unit.target: Card visualization will be created as shown in figure.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Select vin](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4b.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Select vin](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4b.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **City** and **vin** from fields.
trans-unit.target: Select **City** and **vin** from fields.

trans-unit.source: Change visualization to **“Map”**.
trans-unit.target: Change visualization to **“Map”**.

trans-unit.source: Drag **vin** in values area.
trans-unit.target: Drag **vin** in values area.

trans-unit.source: Drag **city** from fields to **Legend** area.
trans-unit.target: Drag **city** from fields to **Legend** area.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4c.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4c.png)

trans-unit.source: Select **format** section from **Visualizations**, Click on **Title** and change the Text to **“Vehicles in operation by city”**.
trans-unit.target: Select **format** section from **Visualizations**, Click on **Title** and change the Text to **“Vehicles in operation by city”**.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Vehicles in operation by city](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4d.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Vehicles in operation by city](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4d.png)

trans-unit.source: Final visualization will look as shown in figure.
trans-unit.target: Final visualization will look as shown in figure.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Final visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4e.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Final visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4e.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **City** and **vin**, change visualization type to **Clustered Column Chart**.
trans-unit.target: Select **City** and **vin**, change visualization type to **Clustered Column Chart**.

trans-unit.source: Ensure **City** field in **Axis area** and **vin** in **Value area**
trans-unit.target: Ensure **City** field in **Axis area** and **vin** in **Value area**

trans-unit.source: Sort chart by **“Count of vin”** ![Connected Cars - Count of vin](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4f.png)
trans-unit.target: Sort chart by **“Count of vin”** ![Connected Cars - Count of vin](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4f.png)

trans-unit.source: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles in operation by city”**
trans-unit.target: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles in operation by city”**

trans-unit.source: Click on the **Format** section, then select **Data Colors**, Click **“On”** to **Show All** ![Connected Cars - Show all Data Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4g.png)
trans-unit.target: Click on the **Format** section, then select **Data Colors**, Click **“On”** to **Show All** ![Connected Cars - Show all Data Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4g.png)

trans-unit.source: Change the color of individual city by clicking on color icon.
trans-unit.target: Change the color of individual city by clicking on color icon.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Change Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4h.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Change Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4h.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Clustered Column Chart** visualization from visualizations, drag **city** field in **Axis** area, **Model** in **Legend** area and **vin** in **Value** area.
trans-unit.target: Select **Clustered Column Chart** visualization from visualizations, drag **city** field in **Axis** area, **Model** in **Legend** area and **vin** in **Value** area.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Clustered Column Chart](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4i.png) ![Connected Cars - Rendering](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4j.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Clustered Column Chart](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4i.png) ![Connected Cars - Rendering](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4j.png)

trans-unit.source: Rearrange all visualization on this page as shown in figure.
trans-unit.target: Rearrange all visualization on this page as shown in figure.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4k.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4k.png)

trans-unit.source: You have successfully configured the “Vehicles in operation” real-time report.
trans-unit.target: You have successfully configured the “Vehicles in operation” real-time report.

trans-unit.source: You can proceed to create the next real-time report or stop here and configure the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can proceed to create the next real-time report or stop here and configure the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: 2. Vehicles Requiring Maintenance
trans-unit.target: 2. Vehicles Requiring Maintenance

trans-unit.source: Click on ![Add](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4add.png) to add a new report, rename it to **“Vehicles Requiring Maintenance”**
trans-unit.target: Click on ![Add](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4add.png) to add a new report, rename it to **“Vehicles Requiring Maintenance”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Vehicles Requiring Maintenance](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4l.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Vehicles Requiring Maintenance](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4l.png)

trans-unit.source: Select **vin** field and change visualization type to **Card**.
trans-unit.target: Select **vin** field and change visualization type to **Card**.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Vin Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4m.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Vin Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4m.png)

trans-unit.source: In the dataset we have a field named “MaintenanceLabel”.
trans-unit.target: In the dataset we have a field named “MaintenanceLabel”.

trans-unit.source: This field can have a value of “0” or “1”.”
trans-unit.target: This field can have a value of “0” or “1”.”

trans-unit.source: It is set by the Azure Machine Learning model provisioned as part of solution and integrated with the real-time path.
trans-unit.target: It is set by the Azure Machine Learning model provisioned as part of solution and integrated with the real-time path.

trans-unit.source: The “1” value indicate a vehicle requires maintenance.
trans-unit.target: The “1” value indicate a vehicle requires maintenance.

trans-unit.source: We will be adding **Page Level** filter for showing vehicles data which are requiring maintenance.
trans-unit.target: We will be adding **Page Level** filter for showing vehicles data which are requiring maintenance.

trans-unit.source: Drag the **“MaintenanceLabel”** field into **Page Level Filters**.
trans-unit.target: Drag the **“MaintenanceLabel”** field into **Page Level Filters**.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Page Level Filters](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n1.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Page Level Filters](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n1.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on **Basic Filtering** menu present at bottom of MaintenanceLabel Page Level Filter.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Basic Filtering** menu present at bottom of MaintenanceLabel Page Level Filter.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Basic Filtering](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n2.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Basic Filtering](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n2.png)

trans-unit.source: Set its filter value to **“1”** ![Connected Cars - Filter Value](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n3.png)
trans-unit.target: Set its filter value to **“1”** ![Connected Cars - Filter Value](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4n3.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Clustered Column Chart** from visualizations ![Connected Cars - Vind Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4o.png) ![Connected Cars - Clustered Column Chart](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4p.png)
trans-unit.target: Select **Clustered Column Chart** from visualizations ![Connected Cars - Vind Card Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4o.png) ![Connected Cars - Clustered Column Chart](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4p.png)

trans-unit.source: Drag field **Model** into **Axis** area, **Vin** to **Value** area.
trans-unit.target: Drag field **Model** into **Axis** area, **Vin** to **Value** area.

trans-unit.source: Then sort visualization by **Count of vin**.
trans-unit.target: Then sort visualization by **Count of vin**.

trans-unit.source: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles requiring maintenance by model”**
trans-unit.target: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles requiring maintenance by model”**

trans-unit.source: Drag **vin** fields into **Color Saturation** present at **Fields** ![Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4field.png) section of **Visualization** tab ![Connected Cars - Color Saturation](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4q.png)
trans-unit.target: Drag **vin** fields into **Color Saturation** present at **Fields** ![Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4field.png) section of **Visualization** tab ![Connected Cars - Color Saturation](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4q.png)

trans-unit.source: Change **Data Colors** in visualizations from **Format** section Change Minimum color to : **F2C812** Change Maximum color to: **FF6300** ![Connected Cars - Color Changes](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4r.png) ![Connected Cars - New Visualization Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4s.png)
trans-unit.target: Change **Data Colors** in visualizations from **Format** section Change Minimum color to : **F2C812** Change Maximum color to: **FF6300** ![Connected Cars - Color Changes](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4r.png) ![Connected Cars - New Visualization Colors](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4s.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Clustered column chart** from visualizations, drag **vin** field into **Value** area, drag **City** field into **Axis** area.
trans-unit.target: Select **Clustered column chart** from visualizations, drag **vin** field into **Value** area, drag **City** field into **Axis** area.

trans-unit.source: Sort chart by **“Count of vin”**.
trans-unit.target: Sort chart by **“Count of vin”**.

trans-unit.source: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles requiring maintenance by city”** ![Connected Cars - Vehicles requiring maintenance by city](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4t.png)
trans-unit.target: Change chart **Title** to **“Vehicles requiring maintenance by city”** ![Connected Cars - Vehicles requiring maintenance by city](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4t.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Multi Row Card** visualization from visualizations, drag **Model** and **vin** into the **Fields** area.
trans-unit.target: Select **Multi Row Card** visualization from visualizations, drag **Model** and **vin** into the **Fields** area.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4u.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4u.png)

trans-unit.source: Rearrange all visualization, The final report will look like as shown below ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4v.png)
trans-unit.target: Rearrange all visualization, The final report will look like as shown below ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4v.png)

trans-unit.source: You have successfully configured the “Vehicles Requiring Maintenance” real-time report.
trans-unit.target: You have successfully configured the “Vehicles Requiring Maintenance” real-time report.

trans-unit.source: You can proceed to create the next real-time report or stop here and configure the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can proceed to create the next real-time report or stop here and configure the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: 3. Vehicles Health Statistics
trans-unit.target: 3. Vehicles Health Statistics

trans-unit.source: Click on ![Add](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4add.png) to add new report, rename it to **“Vehicles Health Statistics”**
trans-unit.target: Click on ![Add](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4add.png) to add new report, rename it to **“Vehicles Health Statistics”**

trans-unit.source: Select **Gauge** visualization from visualizations, then drag the **Speed** field into **Value, Minimum Value, Maximum Value** areas.
trans-unit.target: Select **Gauge** visualization from visualizations, then drag the **Speed** field into **Value, Minimum Value, Maximum Value** areas.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4w.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4w.png)

trans-unit.source: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Value area** to **Average**
trans-unit.target: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Value area** to **Average**

trans-unit.source: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Minimum area** to **Minimum**
trans-unit.target: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Minimum area** to **Minimum**

trans-unit.source: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Maximum area** to **Maximum**
trans-unit.target: Change the default aggregation of **speed** in **Maximum area** to **Maximum**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4x.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Multi Row Card](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4x.png)

trans-unit.source: Rename the **Gauge Title** to **“Average speed”**
trans-unit.target: Rename the **Gauge Title** to **“Average speed”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Gauge](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4y.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Gauge](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4y.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Similarly add a **Gauge** for **average engine oil**, **average fuel**, and **average engine temperate**.
trans-unit.target: Similarly add a **Gauge** for **average engine oil**, **average fuel**, and **average engine temperate**.

trans-unit.source: Change the default aggregation of fields in each gauge as per above steps in **“Average speed”** gauge.
trans-unit.target: Change the default aggregation of fields in each gauge as per above steps in **“Average speed”** gauge.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Gauges](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4z.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Gauges](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4z.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Line and Clustered Column Chart** from visualizations, then drag **City** field into **Shared Axis**, drag **speed**, **tirepressure and engineoil fields** into **Column Values** area, change their aggregation type to **Average**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Line and Clustered Column Chart** from visualizations, then drag **City** field into **Shared Axis**, drag **speed**, **tirepressure and engineoil fields** into **Column Values** area, change their aggregation type to **Average**.

trans-unit.source: Drag the **engineTemperature** field into **Line Values** area, change the aggregation type to **Average**.
trans-unit.target: Drag the **engineTemperature** field into **Line Values** area, change the aggregation type to **Average**.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4aa.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4aa.png)

trans-unit.source: Change the chart **Title** to **“Average speed, tire pressure, engine oil and engine temperature”**
trans-unit.target: Change the chart **Title** to **“Average speed, tire pressure, engine oil and engine temperature”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4bb.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Visualizations Fields](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4bb.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Treemap** visualization from visualizations, drag the **Model** field into the **Group** area, and drag the field **MaintenanceProbability** into the **Values** area.
trans-unit.target: Select **Treemap** visualization from visualizations, drag the **Model** field into the **Group** area, and drag the field **MaintenanceProbability** into the **Values** area.

trans-unit.source: Change the chart **Title** to **“Vehicle models requiring maintenance”**
trans-unit.target: Change the chart **Title** to **“Vehicle models requiring maintenance”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4cc.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4cc.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **100% Stacked Bar Chart** from visualization from visualizations, drag the **city** field into the **Axis** area, and drag the **MaintenanceProbability**, **RecallProbability** fields into the **Value** area
trans-unit.target: Select **100% Stacked Bar Chart** from visualization from visualizations, drag the **city** field into the **Axis** area, and drag the **MaintenanceProbability**, **RecallProbability** fields into the **Value** area

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Add New Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4dd.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Add New Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4dd.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on **Format**, select **Data Colors**, change the **MaintenanceProbability** color to the value **“F2C80F”**
trans-unit.target: Click on **Format**, select **Data Colors**, change the **MaintenanceProbability** color to the value **“F2C80F”**

trans-unit.source: Change the **Title** of the chart to **“Probability of Vehicle Maintenance & Recall by City”**
trans-unit.target: Change the **Title** of the chart to **“Probability of Vehicle Maintenance & Recall by City”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Add New Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ee.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Add New Visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ee.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Area Chart** from visualization from visualizations, drag the **Model** field into the **Axis** area, and drag the **engineOil, tirepressure, speed and MaintenanceProbability** fields into the **Values** area.
trans-unit.target: Select **Area Chart** from visualization from visualizations, drag the **Model** field into the **Axis** area, and drag the **engineOil, tirepressure, speed and MaintenanceProbability** fields into the **Values** area.

trans-unit.source: Change their aggregation type to **“Average”**.
trans-unit.target: Change their aggregation type to **“Average”**.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Change Aggregation Type](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ff.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Change Aggregation Type](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ff.png)

trans-unit.source: Change the Title of the chart to **“Average engine oil, tire pressure, speed and maintenance probability by model”**
trans-unit.target: Change the Title of the chart to **“Average engine oil, tire pressure, speed and maintenance probability by model”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4gg.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4gg.png)

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank area to add new visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select **Scatter Chart** visualization from visualizations
trans-unit.target: Select **Scatter Chart** visualization from visualizations

trans-unit.source: Drag the **Model** field into the **Details** and **Legend** area
trans-unit.target: Drag the **Model** field into the **Details** and **Legend** area

trans-unit.source: Drag the **fuel** field into the **X Axis** area, change the aggregation to Average
trans-unit.target: Drag the **fuel** field into the **X Axis** area, change the aggregation to Average

trans-unit.source: Drag **engineTemparature** into **Y Axis area**, change the aggregation to **Average**
trans-unit.target: Drag **engineTemparature** into **Y Axis area**, change the aggregation to **Average**

trans-unit.source: drag the **vin** field into the **Size** area
trans-unit.target: drag the **vin** field into the **Size** area

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Add new visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4hh.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Add new visualization](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4hh.png)

trans-unit.source: Change the chart **Title** to **“Averages of Fuel, Engine Temperature by Model”**
trans-unit.target: Change the chart **Title** to **“Averages of Fuel, Engine Temperature by Model”**

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ii.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars - Change Chart Title](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4ii.png)

trans-unit.source: The final report will look like as shown below.
trans-unit.target: The final report will look like as shown below.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars-Final Report](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4jj.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars-Final Report](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.4jj.png)

trans-unit.source: Pin visualizations from the reports to the real-time dashboard
trans-unit.target: Pin visualizations from the reports to the real-time dashboard

trans-unit.source: Create a blank dashboard by clicking on the plus icon next to Dashboards.
trans-unit.target: Create a blank dashboard by clicking on the plus icon next to Dashboards.

trans-unit.source: You can name it “Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Dashboard”
trans-unit.target: You can name it “Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Dashboard”

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.5.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.5.png)

trans-unit.source: Pin the visualization from the above reports to the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Pin the visualization from the above reports to the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.6.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-3.6.png)

trans-unit.source: The dashboard should look as shown below when all the 3 reports are created and the corresponding visualizations are pinned to the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: The dashboard should look as shown below when all the 3 reports are created and the corresponding visualizations are pinned to the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Your dashboard could look different if you have not created all the reports.
trans-unit.target: Your dashboard could look different if you have not created all the reports.

trans-unit.source: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-4.0.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars-Dashboard](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/connected-cars-4.0.png)

trans-unit.source: Congratulations!!
trans-unit.target: Congratulations!!

trans-unit.source: You have successfully created the real-time dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You have successfully created the real-time dashboard.

trans-unit.source: As you continue to execute CarEventGenerator.exe and RealtimeDashboardApp.exe, you should see live updates on the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: As you continue to execute CarEventGenerator.exe and RealtimeDashboardApp.exe, you should see live updates on the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: It should take about 10 to 15 minutes to complete the below steps.
trans-unit.target: It should take about 10 to 15 minutes to complete the below steps.

trans-unit.source: Setup Power BI batch processing dashboard
trans-unit.target: Setup Power BI batch processing dashboard

trans-unit.source: Note: It takes about 2 hours (from the successful completion of the deployment) for the end to end batch processing pipeline to finish execution and process a year worth of generated data.
trans-unit.target: Note: It takes about 2 hours (from the successful completion of the deployment) for the end to end batch processing pipeline to finish execution and process a year worth of generated data.

trans-unit.source: Please wait before proceeding with the next steps.
trans-unit.target: Please wait before proceeding with the next steps.

trans-unit.source: **Download the PowerBI designer file** • A pre-configured PowerBI designer file is included as part of the deployment • Click on the PowerBI node on the diagram view and click 'Download the PowerBI designer' file link on the properties pane ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/9.5-download-powerbi-designer.png)
trans-unit.target: **Download the PowerBI designer file** • A pre-configured PowerBI designer file is included as part of the deployment • Click on the PowerBI node on the diagram view and click 'Download the PowerBI designer' file link on the properties pane ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/9.5-download-powerbi-designer.png)

trans-unit.source: • Save locally
trans-unit.target: • Save locally

trans-unit.source: **Configure PowerBI reports** • Open the designer file ‘VehicleTelemetryAnalytics - Desktop Report.pbix’ using PowerBI Desktop.
trans-unit.target: **Configure PowerBI reports** • Open the designer file ‘VehicleTelemetryAnalytics - Desktop Report.pbix’ using PowerBI Desktop.

trans-unit.source: If you do not already have, install the PowerBI Desktop from [PowerBI Desktop install](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=45331).
trans-unit.target: If you do not already have, install the PowerBI Desktop from [PowerBI Desktop install](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=45331).

trans-unit.source: • Click on the **Edit Queries**.
trans-unit.target: • Click on the **Edit Queries**.

trans-unit.source: Double click on the **Source**.
trans-unit.target: Double click on the **Source**.

trans-unit.source: Update Server connection string with the Azure SQL server that got provisioned as part of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Update Server connection string with the Azure SQL server that got provisioned as part of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: Click the Azure SQL node on the diagram and view the server name of the properties pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the Azure SQL node on the diagram and view the server name of the properties pane.

trans-unit.source: Leave **Database** as *connectedcar*.
trans-unit.target: Leave **Database** as *connectedcar*.

trans-unit.source: Click on **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **OK**.

trans-unit.source: You will see **Windows credential** tab selected by default, change it to **Database credentials** by clicking on **Database** tab at right.
trans-unit.target: You will see **Windows credential** tab selected by default, change it to **Database credentials** by clicking on **Database** tab at right.

trans-unit.source: Provide the **Username** and **Password** of your Azure SQL Database that was specified during its deployment setup.
trans-unit.target: Provide the **Username** and **Password** of your Azure SQL Database that was specified during its deployment setup.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Connect**
trans-unit.target: Click on **Connect**

trans-unit.source: Repeat the above steps, for each remaining 3 queries present at right pane, and update the data source connection details.
trans-unit.target: Repeat the above steps, for each remaining 3 queries present at right pane, and update the data source connection details.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Close and Load**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Close and Load**.

trans-unit.source: Power BI Desktop file datasets are connected to SQL Azure Database tables.
trans-unit.target: Power BI Desktop file datasets are connected to SQL Azure Database tables.

trans-unit.source: **Close** Power BI Desktop file.
trans-unit.target: **Close** Power BI Desktop file.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save** button to save the changes.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save** button to save the changes.

trans-unit.source: You have now configured all the reports corresponding to the batch processing path in the solution.
trans-unit.target: You have now configured all the reports corresponding to the batch processing path in the solution.

trans-unit.source: Upload to *powerbi.com*
trans-unit.target: Upload to *powerbi.com*

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the PowerBI web portal at http://powerbi.com and login.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the PowerBI web portal at http://powerbi.com and login.

trans-unit.source: Click on Get Data
trans-unit.target: Click on Get Data

trans-unit.source: Upload the Power BI Desktop File.
trans-unit.target: Upload the Power BI Desktop File.

trans-unit.source: To upload, click on **Get Data -> Files Get -> Local file**
trans-unit.target: To upload, click on **Get Data -> Files Get -> Local file**

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the **“VehicleTelemetryAnalytics – Desktop Report.pbix”**
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the **“VehicleTelemetryAnalytics – Desktop Report.pbix”**

trans-unit.source: Once the file is uploaded, you will be navigated back to your Power BI work space.
trans-unit.target: Once the file is uploaded, you will be navigated back to your Power BI work space.

trans-unit.source: A dataset, report and a blank dashboard will be created for you.
trans-unit.target: A dataset, report and a blank dashboard will be created for you.

trans-unit.source: Pin charts to the existing dashboard **Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Dashboard** in **Power BI**.
trans-unit.target: Pin charts to the existing dashboard **Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Dashboard** in **Power BI**.

trans-unit.source: Click on the blank dashboard created above and then navigate to the **Reports** section click on the newly uploaded report.
trans-unit.target: Click on the blank dashboard created above and then navigate to the **Reports** section click on the newly uploaded report.

trans-unit.source: ![Vehicle Telemetry PowerBI.com](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard1.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Vehicle Telemetry PowerBI.com](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard1.png)

trans-unit.source: **Note the report has six pages:** Page 1: Vehicle density Page 2: Real time vehicle health Page 3: Aggressively Driven Vehicles Page 4: Recalled vehicles Page 5: Fuel Efficiently Driven Vehicles Page 6: Contoso Logo
trans-unit.target: **Note the report has six pages:** Page 1: Vehicle density Page 2: Real time vehicle health Page 3: Aggressively Driven Vehicles Page 4: Recalled vehicles Page 5: Fuel Efficiently Driven Vehicles Page 6: Contoso Logo

trans-unit.target: ![Connected Cars PowerBI.com](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard2.png)

trans-unit.target: **From Page 3**, pin the following

trans-unit.target: Count of VIN ![Connected Cars PowerBI.com](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry-powerbi-dashboard/vehicle-telemetry-dashboard3.png)

trans-unit.source: **Organize the dashboard**
trans-unit.target: **Organize the dashboard**

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the dashboard
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the dashboard

trans-unit.source: Hover over each chart and rename it based on the naming provided in the complete dashboard image below.
trans-unit.target: Hover over each chart and rename it based on the naming provided in the complete dashboard image below.

trans-unit.source: Also move the charts around to look like the dashboard below.
trans-unit.target: Also move the charts around to look like the dashboard below.

trans-unit.target: The final completed dashboard should look like the below if you have created all the reports as mentioned in this document.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations!!
trans-unit.target: Congratulations!!

trans-unit.source: You have successfully created the reports and the dashboard to gain real-time, predictive and batch insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
trans-unit.target: You have successfully created the reports and the dashboard to gain real-time, predictive and batch insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
